markdownRemark.html:
PERFECTLY RANDOM TOPIC…

I literally do not have time to write but still force myself to do so as I like the habit of articulating my thoughts through this blog.

And my topic (sort of) is garbage! what a weird thing to discuss in this blog of which is themed to philosphy and tech… but I believe it is important to think of garbage in a way as how it is so pervasive to our lives - physically and mentally.

Physical garbage is so problematic as we as a species do not know what to do with it. I talked about it extensively with my blog about consumption
